description: Number of k with 1 <= k <= n relatively prime to phi(k).
comments: lim_{n->oo} a(n) * log(log(log( n ))) / n = 1 / exp( gamma ).
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 115-119.
links: P. Erdős, Some asymptotic formulas in number theory, J. Indian Math. Soc. 12 (1948) 75-78.
S. R. Finch, Euler Totient Function Asymptotic Constants
Z. Ruzsa, Erdős and the integers, J. Number Theory 79 (1999) 115-163.
formula: a(n) = sum of GCD( k, phi(k)) = 1 for 0 < k <= n.
crossrefs: Gamma function: A001620, phi function: A000010.
author: _Frank Ellermann_, May 29 2001
